author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Orthofix International NV Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.27 From Continuing Operations
text:
April 30 (Reuters) - Orthofix International NV:
* ORTHOFIX REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.39 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.27 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q1 SALES $108.7 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $107.1 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.37 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* 2018 GUIDANCE REAFFIRMED * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.73, REVENUE VIEW $458.2 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
